name: BAS: The Early Days
description:
They year is 1962. A missile submarine around Cuba launched a nuclear warhead towards the continental United States. The US soon retaliated by launching a nuclear weapon on a Russian city. This sparked the Third Great War. 

"I know not with what weapons World War III will be fought, but World War IV will be fought with sticks and stones" -Albert Einstein 1940.

HOW TO PLAY

In the top left corner, the UI will display ▶ if you can currently launch a nuclear missile. If it displays ◊, you must wait 10 seconds (5 seconds if your population is below 33 million) to launch another nuke. Your population is on the bottom side.

You win if you make the opponents population go down by 50%. However, if your population goes down below 26 million, you will lose.#

You use a nuclear weapon by clicking first on a city of yours to launch from (BLUE) and then clicking on an enemy city (RED).

Below each city is written its population.
